item.title: Stability and collapse of Oseledets spectrum for Perron-Frobenius cocycles
item.description: It is known, by work of Bochi, Mañé, Viana and others that Lyapunov exponents are highly sensitive to perturbations of a dynamical system. On the other hand, work of Ledrappier, Young and my work with Froyland and Gonz´alez-Tokman has shown that in some situations, under “noise-like” perturbations, Lyapunov exponents vary continuously.
